0x02538820 -> 	add $s1, $s2, $s3 -> 
[000000]10010100111000100000100000 -> mars 4.5
 000000 10010100111000100000100000 -> cÃ³digo binario para ler

20110004 -> 100000000(*17)0000000000000100 ->addi $s1, $0, 4
20120003 -> 100000000(*18)0000000000000011 ->addi $s2, $0, 3
22310005 -> 1000(*17)(*17)0000000000000101 ->addi $s1, $s1, 5
22520007 -> 1000(*18)(*18)0000000000000111 ->addi $s2, $s2, 7

            10010100111000100000100000


02320018 -> (17*)(18*)0000000000011000 -> mult $s1, $s2
02400013 -> (18*)000000000000000010011 -> mtlo $s2

03e00008 -> (31*)000000000000000   jr $ra -> $31

01208809 -> (9**)00000(17*)00000001001 jalr $17 $9

(0810000a)16 = (0000 1000 0001 0000 0000 0000 0000 1010)2

(00400028)16 =   (0000 0000 0100 0000 0000 0000 0010 10)2
